name: Preschool Math Teacher: Learning Game for Kids
name_original: Preschool Math Teacher: Learning Game for Kids
description:
Preschool Math Teacher all in one math learning game for Kids and Toddler. An Educational app that is learns your kids about math with so much fun. In this Math Learning game you will get to perform various Math activities before going to school. Your Kids and Toddler easily learn about Counting, Addition, Subtraction, Arrangement, Compare, Pattern match and more. Your kids surely like beautiful cartoon scene and funny sound in this Preschool Math Learning Game.

                              

Preschool Math game is best way to learn math in fun way. Best way of education for kids and toddler that can improve kids math skill. Play and enjoy this Preschool Math Teacher Learning game and share with your friends and Family.

 

Features:

 

  • Easy to learn Math
  • All in one Math learning game for kids
  • Counting, Addition, Subtraction, Compare, Arrangement, Patterns Matching and more
  • Beautiful Graphics Design and Funny Sound.
  • All Levels are Free
  • Friendly User interface
